main event: Multiple witnesses observed unidentified flying objects in Banning, California, between June and October 1956.
interesting points: Witnesses reported a bright light in the sky that changed color and hovered,One object was described as silvery, the size of a jet fighter, and made no sound,Witness Mrs. D. W. Henderson saw a round, bright object hovering over her house with flashing lights,The object observed on June 6, 1956, was noted to move at high speed after hovering,The sightings were documented in Project Blue Book, noting varied conclusions about the object's nature.
witness description: One witness was a pilot familiar with various aircraft, another was a credible local resident.
